name: Meteor Masher
description:
INTRO: This is the first version of my first space shooter. All visual assets are made by me. Music and some sound effects are NOT. Music credit : Ari Pulkkinen (Super Stardust HD)

MOVEMENT: Use the mouse cursor to aim and WASD to move the ship. Left mb to fire.

GOAL: Survive for as long as possible. Shoot meteors and red enemies to score points. Earn enough points to spawn a boss and defeat it (if you can).

NOTES: Pausing the game with ESC does work, but the buttons on the pause menu does not (Use ESC to return to the game). Press ENTER on death to return to menu. No, the volume in options does not work yet either.
